law.catch_line: This subtitle does not repeal the law relating to:...
law.text:
This subtitle does not repeal the law relating to:
Fraudulent conveyances from one spouse to the other, as provided in §§ 4-205, 4-206, and 4-301 of the Family Law Article;
Priorities and preferences in insolvency, as provided in Subtitle 1 of this title; or
Bulk transfers, as defined in Title 6 of this article.
